Brooklyn Historical Society
Rosenfeld and Ginsberg families photographs V1990.033
0.04 Linear Feet 11 items housed in one folder.
circa 1935 to 1945 The Rosenfeld and Ginsberg families photographs consist of 11 black-and-white photographic prints, dating from circa 1935 to 1945, that primarily depict Helen Ginsberg (nee Helen Rosenfeld), Sam Ginsberg, Helen's parents (mother Anna Rosenfeld; father not identified by forename), and other family and friends of Helen and Sam Ginsberg. The collection includes street views of the Brooklyn neighborhoods of Brownsville and Borough Park, as well as portraits and group portraits that include Helen Ginsberg and Sam Ginsberg both before and after their marriage. Prints by Accession 56
Scope and Contents
The Rosenfeld and Ginsberg families photographs consist of 11 black-and-white photographic prints, dating from circa 1935 to 1945, that primarily depict Helen Ginsberg (nee Helen Rosenfeld), Sam Ginsberg, Helen's parents (mother Anna Rosenfeld; father not identified by forename), and other family and friends of Helen and Sam Ginsberg. The collection includes street views of the Brooklyn neighborhoods of Brownsville and Borough Park, as well as portraits and group portraits that include Helen Ginsberg and Sam Ginsberg both before and after their marriage.
Biographcial note
Helen Ginsberg (nee Rosenfeld) grew up in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn. The Rosenfeld family home was located at 427 Osborn Street (near Riverdale Avenue). She married Sam Ginsberg, also of Brooklyn.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright for anonymously created items will remain in effect for 120 years following the date of creation. Copyright for unpublished works with a known creator are protected until 70 years following the death of the creator.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Although the source and date of acquisition of this collection is not clear, there is some indication that the collection may have been either a gift of or donated via Linda Wagner in 1990.
Other Finding Aids
Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Rosenfeld and Ginsberg families photographs, V1990.033, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Processing Information
Fully processed to the item level.
